name: Space Skirmish
description:
I originally made this game a while back following Heartbeast's Udemy course. After adding some of my own features (boss fights, increasing difficulty, more advanced enemies, etc) I decided I was finished, but I never shared it anywhere. Until now.

Gameplay:
  • Mouse to move.
  • 'F' to toggle fullscreen.
  • 'Escape' to exit game.

The goal of this game is to get as high of a score as you possibly can. Enemies slowly advance as you defeat them. You will face up to 4 bosses every 500 points (Final boss is at 2000 points). Upon beating the fourth boss you enter 'Infinite Mode' which is exactly what it sounds like. Unlimited waves of enemies.
